name: MUIRBench
description: Multi-image understanding benchmark requiring joint reasoning over several related images.

metrics.name: accuracy
metrics.definition: Question answering accuracy when multiple images must be compared or aggregated

test_method: Provide all image assets and textual prompt simultaneously. Use official evaluation script for answer checking.
notes: Clarify how images are serialized (grids, captions). Some tasks require referencing specific image indices.
